questions.answer: This cyber attack tricks people into revealing sensitive information by pretending to be trustworthy, like a fisherman using bait
questions.question: What is phishing?

questions.answer: This phishing technique targets high-level executives with personalized attacks, like a con artist researching their wealthy mark
questions.question: What is whaling?

questions.answer: This deceptive phishing method creates fake websites that look identical to legitimate ones to steal login credentials
questions.question: What is pharming?

questions.answer: This voice-based phishing attack involves calling victims and pretending to be tech support or authorities to extract information
questions.question: What is vishing?

questions.answer: This mobile phishing variant uses text messages to deliver malicious links, like sending a fake delivery notification
questions.question: What is smishing?
